data.text: @kjoules This is in a country that is controlled by China.  Pilots that are vaccinated face a 2 week lockdown between flights.  And all these deaths? You are right, it does not add up.

@Mendax48989587 @kjoules @fcchk @tara_mulholland @webbhk They've only got seven and a half million people. This is the equivalent of 8,000 per day in the United states. We never neared that rate at all except in New York City irself in early 2020.

@njstone9 @kjoules Well, "the news" in HK mostly stressed on the reported deaths after vaccines, without any context. No report even tried to compare the vaxxed and the unvaxxed death rate until the govt made a fancy chart for them.
And common folks rarely read anything non-Chinese.
@Thomassumthing @kjoules They've got no excuse. They can read the news. And the information from other countries is ubiquitous and overwhelming.
@njstone9 @kjoules Most HK ppl aren't even sure the vaccine is effective, thanks to the govt's misinformation and the media's inaction to clean that up

@ErikTZ5 @kjoules @hkfp Article 31 of the basic law clearly states the airport should be open and so some hospital morgue in over flow is really not sufficient data to close a city for 2 years and set zero target that mean it  could in theory never be re opened

@ErikTZ5 @kjoules @hkfp yes, thanks. I see the news has stories of hospital morgues over flowing and some pictures of containers with the deceased in...but trying to get the basics like how many people died in HK  of all causes seems far from easy  and so no comparison can be made.

@kjoules @hkfp can you find out how many people died in the past week in Hong Kong of all cause death? Is 1282 all cause deaths in HK. We know 980 die in a normal week in HK,so that is an excess mortality of 302. I think most covid deaths are of 1 to 4 other serious illness with covid.
